ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say, 'Alas for us! This is the Day of Reckoning!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And say: "Ah woe! This is the Day of Reckoning."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will then say: “Woe for us. This is the Day of Judgement.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will say, "Woe to us!" (They will be told), "This is the day of receiving recompense".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And will say, “O our misfortune!” It will be said to them, “This is the Day of Justice.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will say: "Woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they shall say: O woe to us! this is the day of requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and they say, 'Woe, alas for us! This is the Day of Doom.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And say: Ah, woe for us! This is the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will say, "Woe to us! This is the Day of Reckoning."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they will say: Ah! woe be Unto us! this is the Day of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and say, ‘Woe to us! This is the Day of Retribution!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will say, "Ah! Woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will say: "Woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and they will say: 'Woe for us. This is the Day of Recompense'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, “Woe to us. This is the Day of Judgment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:20] And they, the disbelievers, will say, ‘O (yā is for calling attention) woe to us!’, [O] our destruction [is here] (waylanā is a verbal noun without any [regular] verbal conjugation). And the angels will say to them: ‘This is the Day of Retribution’, the Day of Reckoning and Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And say) when they come forth from their graves: (Ah, woe for us! This is the Day of Judgement) this is the Day of Reckoning.
